name: cwrc-writer-base
description: intuitive document editing with xml and rdf
author: Andrew MacDonald

scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.precommit: npm run test && npm run check-coverage
scripts.browserify-test: mkdirp build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test && browserify -g deamdify test/test.js -o build/test.js --debug
scripts.watch-test: mkdirp build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test && watchify -g deamdify test/test.js -o build/test.js --debug --verbose
scripts.test: npm run test:electron && npm run generate-coverage
scripts.test:browser: mkdirp coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify -g deamdify test/test.js | browser-run  -p 2222 --static .  | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:electron: mkdirp coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify -g deamdify test/test.js | browser-run --static . | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:chrome: mkdirp coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify -g deamdify test/test.js | browser-run --static . -b chrome | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.debug:build: npm run debug:clean && npm run debug:copyfiles && npm run debug:build:js
scripts.debug:copyfiles: npm run debug:copy:images && npm run debug:copy:css && npm run debug:copy:html && npm run debug:copy:xml && npm run debug:copy:jstree && npm run debug:tinymce:copyskin
scripts.debug:copy:css: copyfiles -u 1 "src/css/**/*" build/ && copyfiles -u 1 node_modules/prismjs/themes/prism.css build/css/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/prismjs/themes/prism.css build/css/
scripts.debug:build:js: mkdirp build/js && browserify test/forDebug/debug.js -o build/js/debug.js --debug --verbose -g deamdify
